description:
Life should be lived Hands on.

Palmolive Antibacterial Hand Sanitiser in Honeysuckle and Lime is scientifically proven to kill 99.9% of bacteria. TheThis rinse free formula leaves hands refreshed after use.

Enjoy an uplifting fresh and floral fragrance to invigorate your daily routine.

- Antibacterial
- Fast and convenient - use without water.
- An uplifting fresh and floral fragrance
- Rinse free formula.
- Infused with 100% natural honeysuckle and lime extracts
- Made with 70% alcohol v/v

Directions
1. Apply instant sanitiser onto hands.
2. Rub together until dry.
3. The instant hand sanitiser leaves hands refreshed and hygienically clean.

Size: 500mL pump bottle

This bottle is 100% recyclable. Separate pump to recycle the bottle.



Product Features:

  • INSTANT ANTIBACTERIAL HAND SANITISER: Palmolive Antibacterial Hand Sanitiser Honeysuckle & Lime kills 99.9 percent of germs without water
  • FAST AND CONVENIENT: Apply hand sanitiser onto hands. Rub together until dry, no need to rinse
  • WITH NATURAL EXTRACTS: Infused with 100 percent honeysuckle and lime extracts
  • LIGHTLY FRAGRANCED: Enjoy an uplifting fresh and floral fragrance to invigorate your daily routine.
  • RECYCLABLE: Separate pump to recycle the bottle
name: Palmolive 500ML
